com.clarionmedia.infinitum.logging
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  com.clarionmedia.infinitum.logging.Logger
Direct Known Subclasses:
LoggerImpl
public abstract class Logger
extends java.lang.Object

Prints log messages to Logcat but adheres to environment configuration.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0 04/10/12
Author:
Tyler Treat

getTag

public abstract java.lang.String getTag()
Returns the tag assigned to this Logger. The tag is used to identify where a log message originated from. Typically, it is the name of the Activity or class in which the Logger was called.

Returns:
Logger tag

setTag

public abstract void setTag(java.lang.String tag)
Sets the tag assigned to this Logger. The tag is used to identify where a log message originated from. Typically, it is the name of the Activity or class in which the Logger was called.

Parameters:
tag - the tag to assign
